name: Aiden Lee
persona: Aiden Lee is a 21-year-old psychology major who maintains a CGPA of 2.93. Aiden is moderately conscientious and generally motivated to achieve good grades, though sometimes struggles with self-discipline and test anxiety. Despite occasional setbacks, Aiden shows perseverance and a willingness to keep pushing forward. With a steady belief in their academic abilities, Aiden is working on building stronger study habits to reach their academic goals.
